name: GIFT CERTIFICATE
description:
"I don't want to be too proud, but I have a good personal style."

-- Alexander McQueen

Though it's hard to go wrong, a Bandtz gift certificate is always a sure bet! Besides, picking out your favorites is half the fun! 

Easy as 1,2,3 
1. Choose your amount
2. Indicate the email of the lucky recipient in the "ship to" section checkout. 
3. Bandtz will email a coded gift certificate on your behalf asap.

name: Radiant Orchid Bow Set
description:
"You can't possess radiance, you can only admire it."
-- Elizabeth Taylor

It's official! Radiant Orchid has been named the color of 2014. Be ready for the new year with this stunning set of bows in the "it" color. 

Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 ½” diameter (3" length when flat), 7/8” wide

name: Frosted Set
description:
“I'll try anything once, twice if I like it, three times to make sure.” 
― Mae West

The Frosted Set will cure your winter blues. A navy trio made up of two frill and one demi-dot Bandtz bands will keep you bright and beaming!

name: Damsel Set
description:
“I generally avoid temptation unless I can't resist it.” 
― Mae West

The Damsel Set is a holiday must! Featuring one black bow and two matching demi-dot Bandtz bands in your choice of either scarlet or emerald. 

Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 ½” diameter (3" length when flat)

name: Black & Silver Gilded Bow
description:
"I used to be Snow White, but I drifted."

― Mae West

Nice with a touch of naughty, the Black & Silver Gilded Bow is just the right amount of sexy. 

Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 1/2" diameter (3" length when flat), 13/16" wide

Please note this item is sold individually.

name: While Gold Gilded Bow
description:
“There is only one thing in life worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.”

—	Oscar Wilde 

The White Gold Gilded Bow is stunning piece and the key to that romantic look. Perfect for brides!

Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 1/2" diameter (3" length when flat), 13/16" wide

Please note this item is sold individually.

name: Black & Gold Gilded Bow
description:
“A smart girl leaves before she is left.”

 ― Marilyn Monroe

The Gold Gilded Bow is an evening must. Instantly dress up any look with a touch of black and gold.

Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 1/2" diameter (3" length when flat), 13/16" wide

Please note this item is sold individually.

name: Gold Dust Bow
description:
“Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.”

— Albert Einstein

The Gold Dust Bow is one of a kind. This black lace has been painted in metallic gold to give it a subtle shimmer - it catches the light and catches the eye.

Elasticity: b (moderate) 
Measurements: 2 1/2" diameter, 2" wide   

Please note this item is sold individually.

name: Jewel Bow Set
description:
“Things are pretty, graceful, rich, elegant, handsome, but, until they speak to the imagination, not yet beautiful.” 

― Ralph Waldo Emerson

Who doesn't love a collection in jewel tones?! These beautiful bows will hold hair in place without leaving a crease and because the ends are specially treated they won't fray!

Elasticity: B (very stretchy) 
Measurements: 2 ½” diameter (3" length when flat), ½”wide

― Oscar Wilde, Lady Windermere's Fan

name: Midnight Bow set

Bandtz bows will hold hair in place without leaving a crease and because the ends are specially treated they won't fray!

name: Onyx Bow Set
description:
“So up I got in anger,
And took a book I had,
And put a ribbon on my hair
To please a passing lad.
And, "One thing there's no getting by --
I've been a wicked girl," said I;
But if I can't be sorry, why,
I might as well be glad!” 

― Edna St. Vincent Millay

The set includes three black bow Bandtz bands.  We've all tried to tie a ribbon in our hair only to have it slip off or come loose. Not anymore! With superb stretch the Bandtz bow series won't leave a crease in your hair and have been specially treated so the ends won't fray after heavy use. Pretty put-together!  
 
Elasticity: B (very stretchy)
Measurements: 2 ½” diameter (3" length when flat),  ¾” wide

The Cluny neutral set includes two white and one brown Bandtz band. 

Innocent simplicity meets vintage charm with the Bandtz cluny series. Reminiscent of the ruffled and flounce cuffs of Victorian dress when worn on the wrist, the Cluny series is both flirtatious and refined.
